item.title: PK X ILE RELEASE (YES PKXILE SHUTDOWN :( o well)
item.dc:creator: @leboaymen leboaymen
item.description:
@leboaymen wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:27, topic:406735”][quote author=veteran god: king cesar link=topic=503734.msg3685458#msg3685458 date=1311811352]


Never trust autorestarters or leeches.

See didn’t I tell you NOT to download it? You guys never listen! When people listen to me there computer is safe! I’m not a liar!
[/quote]You’re all retarded /end

^ this…

OT: If you know it isn’t his, simply say so on the thread and report to a staff member.
There’s no need to turn everything into a multi-page conversation…

furthermore;

Don’t be jealous of my new virus

shut the fuck up?..
Obviously your virus has failed if it has been detected. so what is there to be jealous of?
You like playing with viruses? Go contract some STD’s and get the fuck off the internet…

Are you on something? It was simply a joke, can you not handle a joke? you gonna cry?

Yes, i’m in tears… However did you know?

Stupid ass.

umadbro?[/quote]

umm idk how that virus got there :S but auto restarters r in all sources idk how they get there go download hybridpvp v2 its prob in there as well sorry guys if something happend to ur comps :S or he just put the file in there to frame me who knows becuz the one i got doesnt have that file in there

Read full topic
